EDUCATION:
Back in 2008, Seka received a scholarship in engineering to attend Louisiana State University!
![lsu_tiger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamseka/EstherBot/master/img/lsu_tiger.gif)
But after a semester, he realized it wasn't for him and changed his major to fashion design, losing his scholarship in the process.
His parents weren't too pleased about the news, but Seka is known to work well under pressure.
After several failed attempts to make it to New York's best fashion schools, he pivoted to Industrial Design and transferred back home to the University of Houston. Crisis averted!
